lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Okay class settle down, settle down! We have almost arrived at our field trip destination!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Can anyone guess where we are going?

lines.speaker: Wendy
lines.text: An amusement park!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Nope, more informational!

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: The Science Museum!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: More hands on!

lines.speaker: Ollie
lines.text: Pile of dirt?!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: No Ollie, we have that at school! Fine I will tell you…

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: We are going to...

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: A Corn Canning Factory!

lines.speaker: Wendy
lines.text: You have GOT to be kidding.

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: Boring.

lines.speaker: Ollie
lines.text: Dude, a pile of dirt is better than this.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: I bet we will learn a whole bunch! Thank you Mr. Horns!

lines.speaker: Wendy
lines.text: Of course you would like something so boring.

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Now Penny is right, the trip will be very informational about the work place.

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Plus we will get to see some very cool machinery in action!

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: (Sign)...

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: I guess robots are cool.

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Yes they are! Plus they are giving us free corn t-shirts.
FREE! FREE! FREE!

lines.speaker: Poppy
lines.text: I don’t think you are boring.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Haha thanks Poppy, but it's okay if I am boring. I am happy as I am.

lines.speaker: Poppy
lines.text: Well, I am excited for the field trip, who knows what is in store!

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Uh hi, welcome to Corny Cans Canned Corn.

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: We will be giving you a tour of the facility.

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Yeah, Uh... follow me.

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Alright kids, listen carefully to the worker, he is going to teach you all about how a factory works! Bestow your knowledge to us!

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Uh... right... I guess we can start where we wash the corn.

lines.speaker: Wendy
lines.text: Well, When do we get the free shirts?

lines.speaker: Ryan
lines.text: Where are the robots with guns on them?

lines.speaker: Ollie
lines.text: I just ate some corn I found on the ground. Is that okay?

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Why do you wash the corn Mr. Worker?

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Great question Penny!

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Because it’s dirty if not.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Oh.

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Follow me so we can look at things… I guess.

lines.speaker: Tour Guide
lines.text: Blah, blah, blah... Uh... Blah, blah...

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: I don’t think the tour guide likes giving tours, Poppy.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Poppy?

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: I have to go find her! She must have gotten lost on her way to the bathroom or something.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: She gets scared when she is alone!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Penny, please come join the rest of the group!

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Mr. Horns I just need to go to the bathroom. I will be right back!

lines.speaker: Mr. Horns
lines.text: Okay, just come right back after!

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Yes, sir!

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: I can't find the bathrooms at all.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: That's the only area I haven't checked, It should be here.

lines.speaker: Poppy
lines.text: HEEELP!!!

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Poppy?

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: I think it came from the end of the hall! I need to get to her!

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: What in the world is this place?

lines.speaker: Poppy
lines.text: Let me go!!

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Poppy!!

lines.speaker: Worker
lines.text: Well, well, well what do we have here? Another piggie?

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: Eep!!!

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: There is no way I'm going back there!
It's locked.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: An exit door! I can escape and save my life!
Penny returned to the group and headed home after the tour.
Poppy was never seen again after that day.

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: No! I need to be brave… I need to save my friend and then we can escape together!

lines.speaker: Penny
lines.text: But first, I need to figure out where she is.
I'm not able to use it at the moment.
An empty locker.
